name: R5-DiagnosticReport-R4B-DiagnosticReport
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 DiagnosticReport into FHIR R4B

element.display: A Diagnostic report - a combination of request information, atomic results, images, interpretation, as well as formatted reports

target.display: A Diagnostic report - a combination of request information, atomic results, images, interpretation, as well as formatted reports
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.basedOn`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.category` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.category`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.code`

element.display: Reference to a Composition resource for the DiagnosticReport structure

target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.conclusion` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DiagnosticReport.conclusion` - conclusion has change due to type change: R5 conclusion markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B conclusion

element.display: Codes for the clinical conclusion of test results

target.display: Codes for the clinical conclusion of test results
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.conclusionCode` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.conclusionCode`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.contained`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.effective[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.effective[x]`

element.display: Health care event when test ordered

target.display: Health care event when test ordered
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.encounter`

R5 `DiagnosticReport.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DiagnosticReport.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.id`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.implicitRules`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.issued` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.issued`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `DiagnosticReport.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Key images or data associated with this report

target.display: Key images associated with this report
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.media` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.media`

element.display: Comment about the image or data (e.g. explanation)

target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.media.comment` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.media.comment`

R5 `DiagnosticReport.media.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DiagnosticReport.media.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.media.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.media.id`

element.display: Reference to the image or data source

target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.media.link` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `DiagnosticReport.media.link` - link has change due to type change: R5 `link` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `link`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.media.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DiagnosticReport.media.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.meta`

R5 `DiagnosticReport.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DiagnosticReport.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.performer`

R5 `DiagnosticReport.presentedForm` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `DiagnosticReport.presentedForm` - presentedForm has change due to type change: R5 `presentedForm` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `presentedForm`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.result` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.result`
R5 `DiagnosticReport.resultsInterpreter` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.resultsInterpreter`

element.display: Specimens this report is based on

target.display: Specimens this report is based on
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.specimen` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.specimen`

element.display: registered | partial | preliminary | modified | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | unknown

target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.status` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4B `DiagnosticReport.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/diagnostic-report-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/diagnostic-report-status|4.3.0 (SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget)

element.display: Reference to full details of an analysis associated with the diagnostic report
The subject of the report - usually, but not always, the patient

target.display: The subject of the report - usually, but not always, the patient
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.subject` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `DiagnosticReport.subject` - subject has change due to type change: R5 `subject` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `subject`

element.display: Additional information supporting the diagnostic report
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `DiagnosticReport.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DiagnosticReport.text`
